articles.title: Canada Post union switching from countrywide to rotating strikes starting Saturday
articles.description: The union representing Canada Post employees says it will switch from a countrywide strike to rotating strikes starting Saturday that will get mail and parcels moving again.

articles.title: Jays to find out ALCS opponent tonight
articles.description: The Toronto Blue Jays will find out who they will play in the American League Championship Series after tonight's Game 5 of the Division Series between the Seattle Mariners and the Detroit Tigers.

articles.title: Healthy Chytil a key piece for Vancouver Canucks
articles.description: For the first time in more than six months, Filip Chytil played a regular-season NHL game in more on Thursday.

articles.title: Chytil scores two, Canucks dump Flames 5-1
articles.description: Filip Chytil scored twice and the Vancouver Canucks opened their season with a 5-1 victory over the visiting Calgary Flames on Thursday.

articles.title: Connor shines in season-opening loss to Stars
articles.description: The spotlight was on Jonathan Toews when the Winnipeg Jets stepped on the ice for their season opener against the Dallas Stars on Thursday.

articles.title: Winnipeg Jets drop opener to Dallas 5-4 as late rally falls short
articles.description: Kyle Connor's hat trick extended his NHL record, scoring in an 8th straight season-opening game, but it wasn't enough to overcome a 5-1 deficit.

articles.title: ‘Biggest ever’ great white shark Contender surfaces just off Canada – plumping up on seals
articles.description: The biggest great white shark ever recorded in the Atlantic has resurfaced just off the coast of Canada - where he is plumping up on seals ahead of winter.

articles.title: Deep Sky unveils plans for one of the world’s biggest direct air carbon capture facilities in Manitoba
articles.description:
Carbon-removal startup Deep Sky Corp. plans to build a $500-million direct-air-capture plant in southwestern Manitoba, one of the world’s largest facilities designed to counteract the buildup of CO2 in the atmosphere.
Montreal-based Deep Sky will announce Thu…

articles.title: A-Rod rips New York Yankees’ front office after Blue Jays cruise into ALCS
articles.description: The New York Yankees are out of the post-season after losing to the Toronto Blue Jays

articles.title: ‘Flawed and broken’: Scholars and civil society leaders criticize Ottawa’s AI ‘sprint’ and newly formed task force
articles.description: Academic and community leaders are criticizing Ottawa’s AI Strategy Task Force for being too heavily tilted toward industry. Find out more.

articles.title: Experts intrigued after thrift shopper spots mysterious ancient artifacts on sale for $30
articles.description: Priced at only $30, a collection of rings and medallions discovered in a thrift store in Chilliwack, Canada, has been donated to Simon Fraser University for research.

articles.title: More than 153,000 people harmed in Canada's hospitals last year, study finds
articles.description: In 2024-25, one out of every 17 hospital stays involved at least one harmful event. In a quarter of cases, multiple harms occurred.

articles.title: Thatcher to Canada: ‘It is time for freedom to take the offensive’
articles.description: Revisiting Margaret Thatcher's address to Parliament in advance of what would have been her 100th birthday. Read here for more

articles.title: Human smuggler arrested during traffic stop in Morden, Man., pleads guilty
articles.description: Jose Pablo Hilario Pimentel, 35, was sentenced Wednesday after he admitted to driving five Mexican nationals to Manitoba from Ontario with the intention of taking them across the U.S. border.
